predominantly equity and equity related securities of companies engaged in manufacturing
and infrastructure related sectors. Further, there can be no assurance that the investment
objectives of the scheme will be realized. The Scheme is not providing any assured or
The Scheme would be more suitable for investors who are desirous of increasing their
exposure to manufacturing & infrastructure sector in their personal equity portfolio. Thus,
this Scheme could act as a "top up" over existing investments of such investors in diversified
equity funds. However, for a first time investor, it might still be advisable to initially start his
investment with a diversified equity fund.

The rating indicates that the funds' portfolios will provide 'very strong' protection against

revise the ratings assigned to the scheme at any time on the basis of new information, o
unavailability of information or other circumstances, which CRISIL believes, may have a
impact on the rating. For detail methodology, please visit CRISIL's website www.crisil.c
Past performance is no guarantee of the future results.
